ovdesc.p: This ‘L’ type application records all events related to the process of outward files on a given date.

The key is the date of treatment and the content presents 2 different sets of multi-values. One that records the events concerning the files and the other one for the global batch events unrelated to any file in particular (e.g. start and end of a batch, attempt to execute more than one treatment simultaneously …).
A single look to that file allows the checking of the outward flow treatment. The enquiry SEPA.VIEW.OUTWARD.LOG gives a synthetic view of the main messages with drill down facilities.

desc.p: This field holds the Key to SEPA.LOG.LEVEL: highest error level encountered while issuing all the segments of the XML messages of the outward file..
Associated MultiValue Set of field FILE.NAME
Value should exist in SEPA.LOG.LEVEL Application
This field contains the Identification of the operator.
Associated MultiValue Set of field FILE.NAME
This field denotes the Error level of posted event:
Associated MultiValue Set of field EVENT.TIME
This field is a Narrative of posted event.
Associated MultiValue Set of field EVENT.TIME
This field specifies the Date and time of event posting.
Associated MultiValue SubSet of field FILE.NAME
This field contains the Name of the file generated in library.
This field hold a Key to SEPA.OUTWARD.FILES
Associated MultiValue Set of field FILE.NAME
This field denotes the Error level of the global batch event:
Associated MultiValue Set of field PROBLEM.TIME
This field is a Narrative of the global batch event.
Associated MultiValue Set of field PROBLEM.TIME
This field specifies the Date and time associated to a global batch event unrelated to a given file.
This field specifies the Treatment date
